sentence.Network_en: Executive Summary - Three paragraphs, single spaced, on their own page.
sentence.Network_cn: 执行概要 — 三段落的文章, 各部分从新一页起脚, 单行间距.

sentence.Network_en: The roll was typed single - spaced , without margins or paragraph breaks.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个打字稿没有空行, 没有页边空白,也没有分段.

sentence.Network_en: It was cleanly typed, single - spaced, and to the point.
sentence.Network_cn: 那封信打字工整清晰, 行间留一行距离, 切中要点.

list.abs: Using double spaces instead of single spaces in your code and styles adds up , too ., 在代码和样式中使用双空格代替单空格也会增加尺寸.
